text: Fitting tribute:Justice C. Nagappan (second right), judge, Supreme Court, unveiling the portrait of lawyer V. Mylsamy, at a function organised by the Coimbatore Bar Association in Coimbatore recently. Judge of Madras High Court Justice K. Kalyanasundaram (left), president of Coimbatore Bar Association K.M. Dhandapani (fourth right), and secretary M. Loganathan (third right) are in the picture.- Photo: M. Periasamy
title: Portrait unveiled
